content:
Sure, here's the updated itinerary with the requested information:

Day 1:

* Pickup from hotel at 9:00 am
* Drive to Doi Inthanon (Rank: 4.6, Drive time: 1.5 hours)
* Visit Wachirathan Waterfall (Rank: 4.5, Drive time: 30 minutes)
* Trek to waterfall and Karen village with some view points (Rank: N/A, Drive time: 30 minutes)
* Lunch at local Karen restaurant (Rank: N/A, Drive time: 30 minutes)
* Visit King and Queen Pagoda (Rank: 4.6, Drive time: 30 minutes)
* Visit Hmong market (Rank: 4.1, Drive time: 30 minutes)
* Drive back to Chiang Mai (Drive time: 1.5 hours)
* End of day

Day 2:

* Pickup from hotel at 9:00 am
* Drive to Mae Wang Elephant Sanctuary (Rank: 4.6, Drive time: 1 hour)
* Interact with elephants and learn about their care
* Lunch (Rank: N/A, Drive time: 30 minutes)
* Bamboo rafting on Mae Wang River (Rank: 4.5, Drive time: 30 minutes)
* Drive back to Chiang Mai (Drive time: 1 hour)
* End of day

Day 3:

* Pickup from hotel at 9:00 am
* Visit Wat Chiang Man Temple (Rank: 4.6, Drive time: 15 minutes)
* Visit Bai Orchid Butterfly Farm (Rank: 4.6, Drive time: 30 minutes)
* Visit Huay Kaew Waterfall (Rank: 4.5, Drive time: 30 minutes)
* Lunch (Rank: N/A, Drive time: 30 minutes)
* Visit Queen Sirikit Botanic Garden (Rank: 4.6, Drive time: 1 hour)
* Drive to Night Safari (Rank: 4.2, Drive time: 30 minutes)
* Night Safari (Rank: 4.2)
* Drive back to hotel (Drive time: 30 minutes)
* End of day

Day 4:

* Pickup from hotel at 9:00 am
* Visit Huay Tung Tao Sculpture Park (Rank: 4.4, Drive time: 30 minutes)
* Pong Yang Jungle Coaster @ Zipline (Rank: N/A, Drive time: 30 minutes)
* Lunch (Rank: N/A, Drive time: 30 minutes)
* Visit Baan Kang Wat Creative Village (Rank: 4.4, Drive time: 30 minutes)
* Drive back to hotel (Drive time: 30 minutes)
* End of day

I hope this helps!
